website.name: Brotherhood Trip
website.description: Private, hosted group trips designed for connection, culture, and low-friction logistics (aka: nobody gets stuck planning spreadsheets at midnight).

webpage.name: The Brotherhood Trip (Berlin ‚Üí Prague ‚Üí Vienna)
webpage.description: An invite-only brotherhood week celebrating Shikhin‚Äôs 50th across Berlin, Prague, and Vienna. Join any city. Hosted, curated, and intentionally low-drama.

software_application.name: Brotherhood Trip
software_application.description: A simple landing page + WhatsApp coordination for invite-only group travel (because we‚Äôre adults and nobody wants another app).
software_application.keywords: group travel, mens retreat, brotherhood trip, berlin prague vienna, hosted trips, friends trip, europe trip november

organization.name: Brotherhood Trip
organization.description: Invite-only group travel for friends who want the fun part (connection + culture) without the painful part (planning + chaos).

faq.question: Who is this trip for?
faq.answer: This is an invite-only trip for close friends and family celebrating Shikhin's 50th birthday. It's designed for meaningful connection, great conversations, and exploring three incredible European cities together.

faq.question: Can I join for only part of the trip?
faq.answer: Absolutely. Join in Berlin, Prague, or Vienna for any portion of the week that works for your schedule. Every moment you can be there counts.

faq.question: What's the daily schedule like?
faq.answer: Each day has one main anchor activity (walking tour, museum visit, group dinner) plus plenty of free time to explore, rest, or do your own thing. Nothing is mandatory‚Äîthis is about connection, not obligation.

faq.question: How do I join and stay coordinated?
faq.answer: Fill out the Google Form to let us know you're interested, then all trip coordination happens via WhatsApp. We'll share hotel options, train schedules, and daily plans there.

faq.question: What should I book on my own?
faq.answer: You'll need to arrange your own flights to/from Europe and book your hotel accommodations. We'll share recommended hotels in each city that are close to each other so the group stays together. Train tickets between cities can be coordinated as a group.

faq.question: What's the vibe of this trip?
faq.answer: Think: relaxed exploration, great meals, late-night conversations, and zero tour-bus energy. This is about being together in beautiful places, not checking boxes or following rigid schedules.

hero.headline: An Authentic Heart-to-Heart Trip
hero.subheadline: Recently, I realized life is too short for ‚Äúwe should catch up sometime.‚Äù So let‚Äôs actually do it properly. In Central Europe from Nov 18-25, 2026.
hero.image_alt: Central Europe Travel - Berlin, Prague, Vienna

problem.title: Celebrate Shikhin‚Äôs 50th birthday
problem.subtitle: Come visit a few of my favorite places in Central Europe and bond with my favorite people. Think: real conversations, great walks, memorable meals, and just enough nonsense to keep us humble.

items.title: Berlin
items.description: My favorite city‚Äîwhere my first love story began via a client in the early StatsLateral days. Yes, I‚Äôm counting consulting as romance. Don‚Äôt @ me.

items.title: Prague
items.description: I fell for Prague in 2015 on a solo EU trip: stunning, walkable, and somehow still a great deal‚Äîlike finding a five-star vibe at a three-star price.

items.title: Vienna
items.description: Vienna is where I discovered the kind of art I actually love‚Äîand the kind I hope to pursue one day. Also: coffee so good it feels judgmental.

solution.title: What, When, Where?
solution.subtitle: One thoughtfully designed week for brotherhood, culture, and ease. Basically, the best parts of my favorite trips, without the chaos.

items.title: üìÖ Thursday, Nov 18 ‚Üí Wednesday, Nov 25, 2026
items.description: Ideally, arrive on Thursday and leave on following Wednesday just in time to be back before Thanksgiving.

items.title: üéÇ The main birthday moment: Saturday, Nov 20
items.description: This is the heart of the trip. We‚Äôll be together in Prague, cutting the ‚Äòcake,‚Äô raising a glass.Celebrate life and friendships.

items.title: ‚úàÔ∏è Flexible travel dates
items.description: Come for the full week, or just part of it. Join in Berlin, Prague, or Vienna. Leave when life calls. You join for what you can and would love to see you.

how_it_works.title: Trip Details
how_it_works.subtitle: Seven easy, well-paced days across three cities ‚Äî designed for great conversations, great walks, and zero logistical headaches.

steps.title: Thursday, Nov 18 ‚Äî Arrival in Berlin
steps.time: Land, decompress, and ease into the week
items: Morning: Arrivals into Berlin (from wherever you‚Äôre coming from)
Daytime: Check in, stretch your legs, light wandering or napping
Afternoon: Decompress together at Vabali Spa (optional but highly recommended)
Evening: Welcome dinner at a great immigrant-run Berlin restaurant
Suggested hotel options: Premium Berlin Hotel or Value Berlin Hotel (both central and walkable)

steps.title: Friday, Nov 19 ‚Äî Berlin, Culture & Conversation
steps.time: History, walking, and finding our rhythm
items: Morning: Guided Berlin walking tour (history + neighborhoods, not a lecture)
Daytime: Free time for caf√©s, shopping, museums, or just wandering
Late afternoon: A visit to Futurium (my favorite museum)
Evening: Dinner TBD
Late night (optional): Cocktail lounge or Berlin nightlife

steps.title: Saturday, Nov 20 ‚Äî Berlin ‚Üí Prague (Birthday Day)
steps.time: Travel day + the heart of the celebration
items: Morning: Easy Berlin morning, coffee and packing
Midday: Noon train from Berlin to Prague (approx. 4 hours)
Afternoon: Check into Prague hotels and settle in
Evening: Main birthday dinner and toasts in Prague
Late night (optional): Prague nightlife
Suggested hotel options: Premium Prague Hotel or Value Prague Hotel

steps.title: Sunday, Nov 21 ‚Äî Prague, Nature & Old Town
steps.time: Fresh air, beauty, and deep conversations
items: Late morning: Hike across the river for city views
Afternoon: Rest, caf√© hopping, or Old Town wandering
Evening: Group dinner in Prague‚Äôs main square or historic district
Late night (optional): Rest

steps.title: Monday, Nov 22 ‚Äî Prague ‚Üí Vienna
items: Morning: Easy breakfast and check-out
Late morning: Noon train from Prague to Vienna (approx. 4 hours)
Afternoon: Check into Vienna hotels and walk the city center
Evening: Dinner at my favorite Schnitzel place
Suggested hotel options: Premium Vienna Hotel or Value Vienna Hotel

steps.title: Tuesday, Nov 23 ‚Äî Vienna, Art & Caf√© Culture
items: Morning: Vienna caf√© breakfast together at my favorite museum cafe
Daytime: Hunterwasser museum
Afternoon: Free time for shopping, walks, or people-watching
Evening: Final group dinner in Vienna
Late night (optional): Rest

steps.title: Wednesday, Nov 24 ‚Äî Return Home
items: Morning: Departures from Vienna. Travel back home in time for Thanksgiving

client_experience.title: The Experience
client_experience.subtitle: How this week should feel: easy, meaningful, and genuinely connecting (with enough free time to pretend you‚Äôre ‚Äòjust wandering‚Äô).

testimonial.quote: It felt like a reset‚Äîgreat conversations, great cities, and none of the usual planning stress. I came back better (and annoyingly refreshed).
testimonial.author: Past Traveler

cta.title: Join the Trip
cta.description: Step 1: Fill the Google Form to register interest. Step 2: Confirm details in WhatsApp: (1) cities you‚Äôll join, (2) hotel tier (premium/value), and (3) solo/shared room. We‚Äôll send exact pricing and next steps.
cta.small_text: Invite-only group ‚Ä¢ Target: 10‚Äì15 travelers ‚Ä¢ Capacity is real ‚Ä¢ Your indecision is respected (until it isn‚Äôt).

pricing_client_engagement.title: Estimated Cost (Land Only)
pricing_client_engagement.subtitle: Hotels + trains + breakfasts + group dinners + curated experiences
pricing_client_engagement.tagline: Depends on hotel tier and how many cities you join. Flights and personal spending not included (including your questionable souvenir choices).
features: Two hotel tiers per city (premium/value), close-by neighborhoods
First-class trains between Berlin ‚Üí Prague ‚Üí Vienna
Vienna culture night (concert/opera if available, or museum)
pricing_client_engagement.cta: Get Your Exact Price on WhatsApp

pricing_marketing.title: Deposit & Cancellation
pricing_marketing.subtitle: Designed to make it easy to say yes without feeling trapped (because adult life happens).

plans.name: Reserve Your Spot
plans.tagline: Holds your spot while we confirm group bookings (and stops the endless ‚Äòmaybe‚Äô loop).
features: Refundable until Oct 4, 2026 (approx. 45 days before departure)
After that: partial refund or trip credit depending on booked components
Deposit applied to your final balance
Final balance timing shared on WhatsApp once hotels are confirmed

plans.name: Join for Part of the Week
plans.tagline: Prefer a shorter segment? We‚Äôll still count you as family.
features: Berlin + Prague or Prague + Vienna are popular options
Exact segment pricing shared on WhatsApp

team.title: Host
team.subtitle: Invite-only trip hosted and coordinated end-to-end (primarily via WhatsApp, because we‚Äôre trying to keep everyone sane).

members.name: Trip Host (Invite-Only Group)
members.title: Coordinator
members.description:
Curates hotels, trains, and shared experiences.
Handles reservations and group coordination via WhatsApp.
Will politely remind you of deadlines (multiple times).

members.name: Local Partners (as needed)
members.title: Guides & Venues
members.description:
Trusted local guides for walking tours and vetted venues for group dinners.
Chosen for vibe, walkability, and ‚Äòthis was a great call.‚Äô

members.name: Trip Principles
members.title: How we travel
members.description:
One anchor per day.
Great neighborhoods.
Freedom to opt out anytime.
No tour-bus energy.
No forced karaoke (unless you insist).
